about_the_game:
The events take place in a Soviet forest village located far from civilization. The main character inherits a house. Arriving there, he realizes that his neighbors are hiding something and are behaving strangely. Soon the hero learns that the entire village is part of a cult. Those who sacrifice people and engage in cannibalism. The hero has to get out of the village. But can he?

.

The player's task is to get out of the village. Ahead of the player are sectarians waiting to kill you. Also search for keys and notes that will tell the story of the game and much more that awaits you in this game. You need to find a way out. But can you find the right way out...

Gameplay - The task is simple to move along the plot line. There is also survival in the game. The task is to find objects and use them to get out and not die. It is also up to the player to choose the ending of the game. In the game at three.

Main features of the Game:

  • The game does not have one ending. Everything depends on the player's actions. Where will he go and what will he do. There are three finals in the game. Good ending and bad ending

    • You can pick up items and use them. Notes, door keys and more

      • Invented stories and game characters

        • Survival and search for necessary items

          • Thoughtful and well-developed game locations

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scary scenes that can negatively affect the psyche. Some content may not be suitable for certain age groups. It is recommended to wisely limit the audience of the game.

name: Village Cult

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Processor: Quad core CPU
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: VR is not supported
